website_summaries.verdict: German-engineering and quality construction put this attractive bidet faucet at the top of our shortlist.
pros: Sleek, single-hole faucet that looks great with modern bathroom decor
Made by a company that backs its products with a satisfaction guarantee
Simple to install and easy to use
cons: Although rare, a few faucets were delivered with missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Faucet!
customer_reviews.text: This was for the Duravit bidet I just installed in the bathroom, and it is every bit as excellent as I always expect this brand to be. I have other Grohe and Hansgrohe taps in my home, and they are solid, beautiful and have held up to daily use for over 25 years. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Tattercat

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: The Installer said it was very easy to mount and parts were from high quality. As for me, I’m very happy with its functionality and looks elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Sonera

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product, everything I needed. Description should say pop-up mechanism and lever included. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand and a faucet for a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Great Brand and a faucet for a lifetime. Because bidet's are not that popular in the United States, parts such as these are hard to find. Amazon also has a good price for it.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with the faucet and the service. It fit perfect to the bidet.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: works really well and looks nice in place
customer_reviews.text: Substantial piece, works really well and looks nice in place. The hose moves around quite a good bit.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Best bidet faucet under $100..
customer_reviews.text: Clean modern design. Easy to install. Excellent quality. Easy to use. Perfect angle for my bidet.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great match for our new bidet. Looking forward to getting it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Albano

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of hardware.  Not cheap but worth the price as it matches other hardware in bath.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding looking piece of hardware. Lady of the house says works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: j. Callicott

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in fit, not faucet.
customer_reviews.text: The faucet itself is exceptional in looks and function, but did not provide a drain for the Duravit bidet which I purchased it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: I got the faucet but when my plumber installed it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the faucet but when my plumber installed it was missing the plastic seal inside the drain. Please advise how to get the missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: HPagano

product_meta.title: hansgrohe 31920001 Focus 5-inch Tall 1 Bidet Faucet in Chrome,Small
product_meta.description:
Color:ChromeFounded, Germany's Black Forest, 1901, Hansgrohe is committed to building a strong sense of tradition. Hansgrohe's products offer a lifetime of satisfaction featuring the ultimate, quality, design and performance. Customers appreciate our many breakthroughs, comfort and technology that allow you to make the most of water. With its wide range of products, Hansgrohe has the right solution for you. Enjoy every moment, each one is unique, just like your Hansgrohe shower. Hansgrohe has always had a sharp eye for innovation, designing products with exceptional durability that are not only highly functional but also a source of pleasure. For us, this means constantly advancing and striving for improvements. Our showers and faucets offer many useful functions and details that make daily use as easy and comfortable as possible so that you can enjoy your Hansgrohe products for many years to come. If you have any questions or concerns regarding this product and/or it’s functionality, please contact Hansgrohe‘s Customer Service department at 1-800-334-0455.

specifications.Warranty Description: Hansgrohe, Inc. warrants to the original consumer purchaser that hansgrohe products will be free from defects in material and workmanship for as long as the original consumer purchaser owns both the product and the home in which the product was originally installed.
